task.title: Access the Hotel App
task.shortdesc: The receptionist who has the Hotel App permission could log in the Hotel Management system to check in or check out guests and mange other hotel settings.

step.cmd: Log in the PBX web interface using the receptionist's account.

choices.choice:
User Name: Enter the extension number or the email address of the receptionist.
The PBX administrator can set the login mode.
Password: Enter the extension's User Password.

step.cmd: Click Main Menu, and click Hotel to enter the Hotel App.
After accessing the Hotel App, you can see all the room status on the Room List page.
step.info:
On this page, you can check the room status, check the room guest’s information, and also perform multiple operations:
Check in
Check out
Change room’s Clean status: If the status is incorrect, you can double click the status icon to change the status.
Move guest room
Edit guest’s information
Search room or guest
